desc: This two-semester in-depth course addresses topics in classical and modern physics using algebra, geometry and some calculus. The course is well-suited for students of biology or chemistry or for those desiring a thorough introduction beyond the high-school level.
name: Principles Physics I
notes: Students in Physics 124 must also register for one lab Physics 124AL, BL, CL, DL, EL, or FL.
title: Principles of Physics I
